actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that each introduced bill and resolution contain a statement of the constitutional basis of authority for the bill.

summary.text: Amends rule XXII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that each introduced bill and resolution contain a statement citing the article, paragraph, and clause, or amendment of the Constitution of the United States which is the basis of authority for the bill or resolution.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that each introduced bill and resolution contain a statement of the constitutional basis of authority for the bill.
